text: Félix Sienra (born 21 January 1916) is a Uruguayan former sailor. He took part in the 1948 Summer Olympics and finished in 6th place. Sienra was born in Montevideo, Uruguay. Sienra turned 100 in January 2016. As of 2022, he is the oldest known living Olympic athlete. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:Olympians for Uruguay Category:Sailors Category:Sportspeople from Montevideo Category:Centenarians Category:2023 deaths Category:Jurists
title: Félix Sienra
